data.text: RT @DrZeemering: My Local Government Management class starts tonight. I’m glad I could start the spring semester w/ a #cityhallselfie w/ @B…

My Local Government Management class starts tonight. I’m glad I could start the spring semester w/ a #cityhallselfie w/ @BaileyDickinson - a @UGA_PA_Policy MPA alumnus and assistant to the city mgr in Covington. Last May’s grads got some great local govt jobs! https://t.co/vf6kG65RYd
RT @Formerly_Fish: Had to grab a little #CityHallSelfie today because the City of @NorthamptonMA was looking all cute in this sunshine. htt…

users.name: UGA PADP
users.description: The University of Georgia, Department of Public Administration and Policy, offers internationally recognized graduate (MPA and PhD) programs.

users.name: Eric Zeemering
users.description: MPA Director serving @UGA_PA_Policy / Co-Editor @SLGReview / Personal tweets on local governance & IGR

users.name: UMass Public Policy
users.description:
The UMass Amherst School of Public Policy prepares students to become leaders in public service. 
Social media guidelines: https://t.co/Om0QiNnene

tweets.text: My Local Government Management class starts tonight. I’m glad I could start the spring semester w/ a #cityhallselfie w/ @BaileyDickinson - a @UGA_PA_Policy MPA alumnus and assistant to the city mgr in Covington. Last May’s grads got some great local govt jobs! https://t.co/vf6kG65RYd
Had to grab a little #CityHallSelfie today because the City of @NorthamptonMA was looking all cute in this sunshine. https://t.co/TqC6bI2W3q
